title: Recognition
subtitle: Experiencing appreciation and affirmation for one’s actions and personal qualities within close relationships.

title: Significance
subtitle: Experiencing that one’s personal needs are acknowledged, validated, and taken seriously by others in relational contexts.

title: Autonomy
subtitle: Experiencing the ability to make independent and self-directed decisions within the framework of interpersonal relationships.

title: Personal Space
subtitle: Experiencing a protected personal domain within relationships, where one’s individual boundaries are recognized and respected.

title: Reliability
subtitle: Experiencing continuity, dependability, and emotional stability in close relational dynamics.

title: Solidarity
subtitle: Experiencing supportive and active assistance from others during difficult or challenging times within a relationship.
